about_the_game:
RIFT, the award-winning fantasy MMORPG, is now completely free to play! Download today and enter the magical world of Telara: Experience an unprecedented class system, massive dynamic battles, and player housing like you’ve never seen before.

What’s the only thing that could make the RIFT Glory of the Ascended Pack even better? MORE! Welcome to the Laethys’ Fortune Pack. You’ll wish you had five butts so you could ride all the mounts at the same time, while portably teleporting with Cadbury, your personal banker and experiencing the full capability of every soul. We could layer superlative upon superlative and it still wouldn’t come close to expressing how truly amazing the contents of this pack are! Ride on, Ascended. Ride on.

Includes:
  • 4 Additional Character Slots per Server*
  • 2 Additional Inventory Slots per Character*
  • Tartagon Mount
  • Spindrel Mount
  • Cyclone Mount
  • Tiger Mount
  • Ghost Hellbug Mount
  • Votan Fragger costume weapon
  • 24-Slot Bag Slots
  • Bogling Wastrel Pet
  • Mini-Regulos Pet
  • Personal Banker
  • Portable Teleporter
  • Faction Tabard
  • 90-Day Patron Pass
  • Bonus Skin Color set
  • Bonus Hair Color set
  • Extended Hair Style set
  • Storm Legion Soul Pack (Tempest, Tactician, Harbinger, & Defiler - users who purchased storm legion will not receive extra souls)
  • Title "Of The Storm"
  • Dream Soul Pack (Liberator, Physician, Arbiter, & Oracle)

*Additional Character and Bag Slots are only applied to accounts that have not purchased a boxed or digital copy of RIFT in the past. If you have already received these benefits for purchasing RIFT, these benefits will not stack.

  • OS *: Windows® XP, Windows Vista®, or Windows® 7
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.0 GHz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia® GeForce® FX 5900, ATI Radeon® X300, or Intel® GMA X4500
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 8.1 compliant card
